alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:13PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Broadwater and south central Meagher Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 612 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms clustered near Townsend, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Townsend, White Sulphur Springs, Toston, Silos and Ringling. This includes the following highways... Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 43, and between mile markers 70 and 93. Highway 89 between mile markers 43 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may also lead to minor localized flooding and possibly some debris flow on steep slopes. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
